import React from 'react' import ReviewModel from '../../Models/ReviewModel' const DescriptionReview:React.FC<{productDescription:string|undefined, reviews:ReviewModel[]}> = (props) => { return ( <>
Description Reviews ({props.reviews?.length})

{props.productDescription}

{props.reviews?.length === 0 ? Be the first to write your review! : <>}

inp
    {props.reviews?.map((review:ReviewModel,index:number)=>(
  • {review.reviewBody}
    • ))}
) } export default DescriptionReview
